item.title: The Faith of a Sparrow: Faith and Trust in the Lord Jesus Christ
item.description:
The Faith of a Sparrow: Faith and Trust in the Lord Jesus Christ by Elder H. Bruce Stucki, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Evening of 169th Semiannual General Conference on Thu Sep 30 1999
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder H. Bruce Stucki, Of the Seventy

item.title: Prayer, Faith, and Family: Stepping-Stones to Eternal Happiness
item.description:
Prayer, Faith, and Family: Stepping-Stones to Eternal Happiness by Elder H. Bruce Stucki, Of the Seventy given in Sunday Afternoon of 176th Annual General Conference on Fri Mar 31 2006
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
